channel.title: Game Crash at wind turbine
channel.description: Im at the spot where Gordon Freeman must activate the air turbine that is part of the rocket blast that insinerates the giant plant monster in the silo.Shortly after acivating it the Black Mesa application terminates.

item.title: Game Crash at wind turbine
item.dc:creator: mgr.inz.player
item.description:
@Ketran, from main menu, click load, then choose earlier quicksave or choose autosave.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Crash at wind turbine
item.dc:creator: Ketran
item.description:
I’m at a point where I can’t do that, because five seconds after loading it crashes.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Crash at wind turbine
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Seems to be pretty widespread bug in BM that is beleived to be physics-related. Try to throw all the item that are located at that area and could possibly be “levitated” by this turbine into the turbine and make sure they fell down through it into the abyss. Throw down everything, including monster corpses and two strangely looking “canisters” sitting at the top ledge. It was reported that doing like this cold help you avoid game crash.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Crash at wind turbine
item.dc:creator: NonDeusEst
item.description:
I also have this same problem. :[

Very pleased with the game thus far, would like to finish it. Alas.
